Features:

- Complete Jewelry Inventory Management System
- Manage accounts, dashboard, stock, suppliers, customers, purchases, sales, and giravees
- Create, edit, delete, and view features for stock, suppliers, customers, purchase bills, sale bills, and giravees
- Print bill option for purchases, and sales
- Search functionality to get details about stocks, suppliers, customers, purchases, sales, and giravees
- Daily automatic backup (keeps last backup only)
- Runs fully offline on Windows (no server cost)

This is the first stable version for local use.
